function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardization between smart city technology suppliers","Impact":"Non-communication between cities and data platforms, leading to non-productive system in the case of virus outbreaks","Mitigation":"Standardization of protocols for enhanced smart city communication","Technologies":"Smart city technology for standardized communication protocols","People":"City governments, technology suppliers, public health organizations","Owner":"City governments, technology suppliers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on technological backbone for early detection and management of virus outbreaks","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to delayed detection and mismanagement of virus outbreaks","Mitigation":"Diversification of early detection methods and management techniques","Technologies":"Smart city technology for diverse early detection and management capabilities","People":"Public health organizations, city governments","Owner":"Public health organizations, city governments"},{"Description":"Lack of democratization in the smart city technology sphere","Impact":"Inequity and lack of transparency among stakeholders, hindering cooperation in the case of disasters","Mitigation":"Democratization of smart city technology to encourage equity and transparency among stakeholders","Technologies":"Smart city technology for open-access platforms and transparent data sharing","People":"Stakeholders in smart city technology, government bodies, public health organizations","Owner":"Stakeholders in smart city technology, government bodies"}]}
